suggestions.original: To improve the realism of the artwork, consider focusing on the following aspects: 1. Proportions: Ensure that the human figure and animals have more accurate and consistent proportions. For example, the size of the schoolbag should be more realistic in comparison to the student. 2. Textures: Add more detailed textures to the clothing, animals, and objects to mimic real-life appearances. 3. Depth and Shading: Use shading and highlights to create a sense of depth and three-dimensionality. 4. Perspective: Apply consistent perspective rules to make the scene more convincing. 5. Details: Incorporate finer details in the facial features, fur of the animals, and other elements to enhance realism.
